name: WarDEH
description:
"Do you ever think that life if unfair? Did you ever ask heavens why this all is happening to you?
I sure never did. Thats a weaksperm thing.
Even when Shakal put me in cold dark mines and made me carry gold to the entrance. One bar at a time (For some weird reasons) .
It was obvious to me that this is how the world spins around and I need no justice or fairness. All what I need is to take this bastard's place. That would at least give me something.
So one day I understood what will help me with that. Gold. This thing gave me more power than anyone could ever give. 
With this revaletion my journey has begun"
Controls:
wasd - move
space bar - jump/fly
LMB - shoot
Tab - stop time
